entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
